nav.lociDescription: Your all in one data platform

hero.title: We make finding data for decisions in Africa easy

whyWeExist.title: Why we Exist
whyWeExist.description: Africa is home to over 1.3 billion people spread across thousands of diverse communities, each with dynamic behaviours, activities, and movements. Yet governments, NGOs and businesses still struggle to access quantifiable, up-to-date on-ground realities. We exist to close this gap. We are enabling leaders to make decisions rooted in evidence, not assumptions

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Actionable insights delivered through 10k+ trained field agents with a balanced spread across 40+ cities in Nigeria

readyToStart.title: Ready to get started?
readyToStart.description: Join thousands of users leveraging our platform to transform their data into actionable insights and impactful results.
readyToStart.marketResearchDescription: Data and data acquisition on consumer behaviour, retail distribution, business expansion, and emerging opportunities to maximize revenue and simplify your strategies
readyToStart.govtResearchDescription: Geospatial tools and infrastructures to support custom digital processes for nation-wide projects such as basemap provisioning, census mapping, postcodes generation and automated property taxation
readyToStart.impactResearchDescription: Data from hard-to-reach areas through identification and enumeration strategies support aid delivery, intervention microplanning and across target population

footer.tagline: Turning every corner of Africa into actionable intelligence.

about.subtitle: By Africans
about.title: For Africa
about.intro: The world has spent decades trying to understand Africa from the outside looking in. Satellite images from space. Reports written in distant offices. Data collected by people who've never walked our streets or spoken our languages.
about.flippedDescription: Milsat is intelligence gathered by Africans who know their neighborhoods, powered by technology that respects our realities, and delivered to those ready to see the continent as it truly is—not as it's been imagined. This is Africa, mapped by Africa.
about.commitment: We knew Africa deserved better. More importantly, we knew Africans could deliver it.

contact.title: Ready to discover what we know about your area of interest?
contact.addressText: H4, Plot 574, Ameh Ebute Street, Wuye District, Abuja.
contact.successDescription: We'll get back to you soon to confirm your meeting.
contact.errorDescription: Failed to submit your meeting request. Please try again.

validation.dateRequired: Please select a date and time for the meeting
validation.timeRequired: Please select a time for the meeting

collection.title: Enumerate everywhere, and miss nothing
collection.subtitle: From dense urban settlements to the most remote locations, we crowdsource field data using a 7000+ strong agent network and custom data-collection technologies to ensure complete coverage, high accuracy, and real-time validation across Africa.
collection.fieldTaskDescription: Every agent receives location-specific tasks within predefined geofences. This eliminates overlap, improves accountability, and ensures complete settlement or locality coverage.
collection.baselineDescription: We combine field data with satellite imagery, administrative boundaries, existing datasets, and algorithmic checks from a single community to multiple states or entire countries, while maintaining speed, cost-efficiency, and verified reliability.
collection.realInsightDescription: We activate a verified network of over 7,000 trained field agents, strategically located across cities, towns, and rural communities. This gives us instant reach and reliable coverage across diverse terrains.

integration.title: Your data unified, and ready for work
integration.subtitle: We connect field data, internal systems, and additional sources into a single, harmonized structure, using integration-ready APIs and automated pipelines that make your insights usable immediately for daily operations.
integration.ownershipDescription: Our APIs plug directly into your internal tools, such as Power BI dashboards, Zoho CRM, custom Apps, and other operational systems, allowing you to automate field-to-office data flow and eliminate manual handoffs during exchange
integration.toolsDescription: Our systems provides on-the-go data verification and validation ensuring new discoveries and updates are automatically reflected across your operational and integrated analytic tools
integration.geographicAttDescription: We link geographic features (buildings, households, businesses, streets) with relevant attributes and metadata including lead description , enabling richer insights and location-aware decision-making

intelligence.title: See what’s happening, and what happens next
intelligence.subtitle: IWe convert field and integrated data into actionable intelligence that reveals patterns, predict outcomes, and guide your next move with clarity. From planning to execution, you get visibility that drives results
intelligence.dynamicDashboardDescription: We build interactive dashboards that turn complex data into intuitive visual insights. Users can explore maps, charts, and KPIs in real time, enabling faster decision-making across teams and departments.
intelligence.aiDescription: We develop AI-driven text-to-insight systems that instantly summarize large datasets, reports, and field evidence into clear, actionable narratives, allowing teams to retrieve insights, trend summaries, and decision-ready briefs in seconds.
intelligence.impactDescription: For NGOs, governments, and development partners, we convert raw evidence into measurable indicators that track change, quantify impact, and support reporting, audits, and program monitoring.
intelligence.decisionDescription: We generate automated executive reports, spatial summaries, and operational recommendations, helping leadership teams act decisively and plan strategically using verified intelligence.

finance.title: Accurate data collection for KYC requirements
finance.amlDescription: Attain full anti-money laundering compliance, reduce fraud risks, and minimize bad loan possibilities by accurately verifying customer addresses anywhere in Nigeria with Milsat
finance.validateDescription: Improve internal customer data with new field geospatial attributes to develop a more comprehensive customer database and deliver relevant offerings precisely for your customers
finance.insightsDescription: Mitigate the risks of inaccuracies with new and relevant data about your customer's location and their behaviour to build a framework that fosters unprecedented levels of reliable insights

logistics.title: Location intelligent solutions for optimized delivery
logistics.locationDescription: Identify your high-volume customer base and optimize fleet movement and supply chain with advanced location intelligence technology that puts data at the center of your operations
logistics.timelinessDescription: Combine location data with internal fleet data to optimize delivery routes and understand customer groupings, saving valuable delivery time and improving customer satisfaction
logistics.fleetDescription: Monitor fleet security and compliance with geofences around warehouses and delivery hubs. Leverage geospatial models and RFID technology for complete visibility and control

publicHealth.title: Spatial data acquisition and analysis for micro-planning
publicHealth.populationDescription: Collect geospatial data on population profiles to deliver relief and develop sustainable public health frameworks that reach communities in need
publicHealth.interventionDescription: Understand geographic profiles of target communities and collect accessibility and health center data to design effective intervention strategies
publicHealth.microplanDescription: Create comprehensive maps with population and healthcare facility information to ensure vaccines reach underserved areas and maximize immunization impact

marketing.title: Location intelligence for sales and marketing strategies
marketing.understandingDescription: Gather qualitative mobility data around Points-of-Interest to improve marketing ROI and enhance customer insights for more effective campaigns
marketing.territoryDescription: Use location intelligence to determine current sales zones, identify capturable markets, and optimize resource allocation for customer acquisition
marketing.roiDescription: Leverage location-intelligent mobile and web applications to gather all your business data in one place and make data-driven marketing decisions that deliver results

manufacturing.title: IoT data acquisition for machine optimization and production
manufacturing.downtimeDescription: Control machine operations, predict maintenance needs, and prevent breakdowns with real-time smart metering via IoT sensors that keep your production running smoothly
manufacturing.savingsDescription: Monitor power, energy, and equipment health through IoT sensors and dashboards to identify cost-saving opportunities and optimize your manufacturing operations
manufacturing.monitoringDescription: Track equipment remotely with a simple live dashboard, reduce site visits, and prevent surprise breakdowns with continuous monitoring and real-time alerts

government.title: Digital enumeration and geospatial intelligence for accurate national planning
government.censusDescription: Load high-resolution basemaps, satellite imagery, and settlement layers directly into our digital EAD app, accessible offline for all field teams to ensure every settlement and locality boundary is correctly identified, verified, and ready for use during census operations.
government.postcodesDescription: We capture and harmonize nationwide datasets, buildings, streets, settlement boundaries, and administrative layers, using advanced geospatial tools and verified field data, creating the spatial backbone for a modern and integratable postcode system built on local geography at global standard.
government.propertyTaxationDescription: Deploy all-in-one property geo-portal that enable tax managers to annotate landuse, validate properties geocode, monitor bill generation, bill delivery and bill payment status. Seamlessly track tax compliance  coverage and impact.

weHearYou.title: We hear you
weHearYou.description: Location intelligent mobile and web applications to gather all your business data in one place

expertSupport.title: Expert technical support
expertSupport.description: Comprehensive technical support from industry experts, dedicated to resolving your issues promptly and efficiently.

clearPricing.title: Clear pricing, no hidden fees
clearPricing.description: Transparent pricing with no surprises. Know exactly what you're paying for upfront.

reliability.title: Proven reliability and security
reliability.description: Enterprise-grade security standards ensuring your data is protected with advanced encryption and compliance certifications.

deployment.title: Rapid deployment and scalability
deployment.description: Get started quickly with our streamlined onboarding process and scale effortlessly as your business grows.

industrySolutions.title: Industry-specific solutions
industrySolutions.description: Tailored geospatial solutions designed specifically for your industry needs, delivering precise and actionable insights.
